title: Glazed grapefruit salad with salmon and sea bream
ingredients: 1 vanilla pod, split, seeds scraped out with a knife (the empty pod can be reserved for another recipe)
salt and freshly ground black pepper
200g/7oz salmon fillet, skin removed, pin bones removed, cut into 4 pieces
250g/9oz sea bream fillet, skin on, cut into 4 pieces
salt and freshly ground black pepper
